name: Decolonising the digital rights process in Europe
name_original: Decolonising the digital rights process in Europe
description:
Some people may experience discomfort (such as eye strain, eye fatigue, or nausea) while watching 3D video images or playing stereoscopic 3D games.

If you experience such discomfort, you should immediately discontinue the game.

This game explores the Decolonise Digital Rights Process Journey. Its Fragments try to mirror the thoughts and ideas of the process participants. 

It is playable and unplayable. 

Its architecture is based on open source, librate code from the capital, and reclaim market aesthetics.
